column4: ok my ipod has mounted with the full reboot (YAY) but now my sound is gone
i think it sometimes is trying to play through my disabled in BIOS builtin soundcard.  is that possible?  it still lists it in the volume and in lspci
Make sure that the correct default card is set with "asoundconf list" and "asoundconf set-default-card <card name>"
Change the default card with asoundconf
